{# errorcheck #} {{ _ }} // ERROR `cannot use _ as value` {% show _ %} // ERROR `cannot use _ as value` {% show(_) %} // ERROR `cannot use _ as value` {% show %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected %}, expecting expression` {% show , %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected comma, expecting expression` {% show() %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected ), expecting expression` {{ render "" }} // ERROR `syntax error: invalid file path: ""` {% show(1, 2) %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected comma, expecting )` {% show(if true {}) %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected if, expecting expression` {% show 1, 2, %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected %}, expecting expression` {{ a(b) default }} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected }}, expecting expression` {{ a default b }} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected default, expecting }}` {{ a() b }} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected b, expecting }}` {{ a() default 1, }} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected }}, expecting expression` {{ a() default default }} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected default, expecting expression` {% show a(b) default %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected %}, expecting expression` {% show a default b %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected default at end of statement` {% show a() b %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected b at end of statement` {% show a() default 1, %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected %}, expecting expression` {% show a() default default %} // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected default, expecting expression` {%% show a default b // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected default at end of statement` show a() default // ERROR `syntax error: unexpected newline, expecting expression` %%}
